casebody.data:
Raven BOYANCE, et al.
v.
UNITED FIRE AND CASUALTY COMPANY, et al. No. 2018-C-886 Supreme Court of Louisiana. October 8, 2018

ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, THIRD CIRCUIT, PARISH OF ST. MARTIN

Writ granted. Contested issues of material fact remain. The summary judgment rendered in favor of William R. Caldwell, Clodhopper Trucking, LLC, and Canal Insurance Co. is reversed and the matter is remanded for further proceedings.
